articles.author: Jenn Gidman
articles.title: Woman's Unwelcome Souvenir From Trip: a Brain Worm - Newser
articles.description: Parasite contracted in Hawaii or Southeast Asia caused patient's legs to feel like they were burning
articles.content: A woman on a whirlwind three-week junket to Hawaii, Japan, and Thailand returned home with an unwanted memento: a parasite that embedded itself in her brain and made her legs feel like they were burn… [+753 chars]
